metadata.Title: CVE-2019-20218 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
selectExpander in select.c in SQLite 3.30.1 proceeds with WITH stack unwinding even after a parsing error.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-20218` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

lemon - 3.11.0-1ubuntu1.4
libsqlite3-0 - 3.11.0-1ubuntu1.4
libsqlite3-tcl - 3.11.0-1ubuntu1.4
sqlite3 - 3.11.0-1ubuntu1.4
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> tests hang when this is backported to earlier releases

criterions.comment: sqlite3 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.11.0-1ubuntu1.4').
